headline: Citi Remains Bullish on KLA (KLAC) Amid Persistent Phase 2 Upcycle in Wafer Fab Equipment and Potential Upside
summary: KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) is one of the 13 Best Extremely Profitable Stocks to Invest in Now. On January 30, 2026, KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) attracted increased attention from analysts when Citi increased its price target from $1,450 to $1,800 while reiterating a ‘Buy’ rating. The bullish analyst stance comes amid a persistent Phase 2 upcycle in […]
